document.text:
From: ' 
To:'
Cc: 'r>
Subject: RE: Tags for US v. Epstein Relativity Database 
Date: Tue, 29 Sep 2020 22:44:47 +0000 
Hi=, 
Thanks for all of your help. Can you please (1) remove the responsiveness review field; and (2) create the following 
additional tags: 
• 3600 
Please let us know if you have any questions. 
Thanks, 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, September 22, 2020 9:23 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
> 
Subject: RE: Tags for US v. Epstein Relativity Database 
When you rename this folder, could you please also break the folder into review batches of 500-documents each, and 
assign a third to me, a third to and a third to MI? 
Thanks very much, 
From: 
Sent: Monday, September 21, 2020 6:00 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
> 
Subject: RE: Tags for US v. Epstein Relativity Database 
Hi =I, 
Thanks very much for the quick response. We would like all tags in one field with check boxes, please. We want to be 
able to tag each document with multiple tags if appropriate. 
EFTA00028041

Also, in the same "US v Epstein" database, would it be possible to please rename the folder entitled "Florida Investigation 
FOIA Files_2" to "FBI Files from Florida Office"? The new title will help us understand what is actually in that folder. 
Thanks very much, 
From: 
Sent: Monday, September 21, 2020 8:46 AM 
To: 
Cc:
Subject: RE: Tags for US v. Epstein Relativity Database 
Good Morning, 
> 
Do you want all of these tags in one field on in several fields? Also do you want these tags in both of the Epstein Relativity 
databases? 
Thank you. 
From: 
Sent: Sunday, September 20, 2020 6:04 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
> 
Subject: Tags for US v. Epstein Relativity Database 
Hi=, 
We would like to use several tags as we conduct our review of documents in the "US v Epstein" database on Relativity. 
For that database, would you please help us create the below tags? 
• Reviewed 
• Witness Statement 
• Produce As Is 
• Produce With Redactions 
• Produce As 
Confidential 
• Produce As 
Highly Confidential 
• Work 
Product (Do Not Produce) 
• Potential Brady 
• 
Hot Doc 
• For Further Review 
• 
Tech Issue 
Please let me know if you have any questions or would like to discuss. 
Thanks very much, 
EFTA00028042

EFTA00028043
